intro: Sarcanthus tenuirachis, commonly known as the slender-ribbed ctenanthe, is a species of flowering plant in the family Araceae. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its narrow, elongated leaves with a distinct ribbing pattern. Its inflorescence consists of a spadix surrounded by a modified leaf called a spathe. Sarcanthus tenuirachis is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and unique floral structure.
